nodes.name: P1WethProxy

nodes.documentation:
Fallback function. Disallows ether to be sent to this contract without data except when
unwrapping WETH.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "The perpetual does not use WETH for margin deposits"

arguments.value: The perpetual does not use WETH for margin deposits

approveMaximumOnPerpetual(address).details: Cannot be run in the constructor due to technical restrictions in Solidity.

params.account: The account on the Perpetual for which to credit the deposit.
params.perpetual: Address of the Perpetual contract to deposit to.

params.account: The account on the Perpetual to withdraw from.
params.amount: The amount of ETH/WETH to withdraw.
params.destination: The address to send the withdrawn ETH to.
params.perpetual: Address of the Perpetual contract to withdraw from.

approveMaximumOnPerpetual(address).notice: Sets the maximum allowance on the Perpetual contract. Must be called at least once on a given Perpetual before deposits can be made.

depositEth(address,address).notice: Deposit ETH into a Perpetual, by first wrapping it as WETH. Any ETH paid to this function will be converted and deposited.

withdrawEth(address,address,address,uint.notice: Withdraw ETH from a Perpetual, by first withdrawing and unwrapping WETH.

userdoc.notice: A proxy for depositing and withdrawing ETH to/from a Perpetual contract that uses WETH as its margin token. The ETH will be wrapper and unwrapped by the proxy.
